name: better-folding
description: Improve the folding experience in VS Code

betterFolding.foldClosingBrackets.markdownDescription: Include closing brackets like `}` and `]` in the folding range.

betterFolding.foldClosingTags.markdownDescription:
Include closing tags like `` and `

` in the folding range.

betterFolding.showFoldedBodyLinesCount.markdownDescription:
Shows the number of lines folded, excluding the closing bracket line. 

Example: `function example() { ⋯ 3 lines ⋯ `

betterFolding.showFoldedBrackets.markdownDescription:
Shows brackets like `{` and `}` in the collapsed text. Only applies if `#betterFolding.foldClosingBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Example: `function example() {…}`.

betterFolding.showFunctionParameters.markdownDescription:
Shows the function parameters in the collapsed text for functions with params in multiple lines. Only applies if `#betterFolding.showFoldedBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Example: `function example(firstParam, secondParam) {…}`.

betterFolding.chainFoldingRanges.markdownDescription:
On folding a range, fold all the ranges that start on the same line where the original range ends. Only applies if `#betterFolding.showFoldedBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Enabled: `function example(…) {…}`. 

Disabled: `function example(…) {`.

betterFolding.showOnlyRegionsDescription.markdownDescription:
Only shows the region description in the collapsed text. 

Example: `// #region some text`.

Becomes: `some text`.

betterFolding.showObjectPreviews.markdownDescription:
Show the first property in the collapsed text of an object literal. Only applies if `#betterFolding.showFoldedBrackets#` is `enabled`. 

Example: `{ id:'123',… }`.

betterFolding.excludedLanguages.markdownDescription:
List of languages to exclude from folding. 

Example: `['javascript', 'typescript']`.
